content.txt1: Lo msebenzi ungenza imisebenzi efana nemisebenzi yangempela kubandakanya, kepha kungakhawulelwe ekuchofozeni, ukuvula izinhlelo zokusebenza, njll. Kufoni yakho, futhi kungavula nezicelo ezithile zokukhokha ukuze ukhokhelwe. Ngoba kunezingozi zokuba yimisebenzi erekhodwe, okwenza izinkokhelo, njll., Sincoma kakhulu ukuthi uyikhiphe kuphela uma uqonda ngokuphelele okuqukethwe kweskripthi.
content.txt2: Ungawuvala kanjani lo msebenzi: Vula ikhasi lasekhaya lalolu hlelo lokusebenza, ungayeka ukusebenzisa umsebenzi osizayo kuzilungiselelo zekhasi lasekhaya, noma ungachofoza inkinobho ethi "Vala yonke imisebenzi kanye ne-EXP" ekhasini lasekhaya. Le nkinobho iphoqa ukuvalwa kwayo yonke imisebenzi eyenziwa futhi kuphoqe ukuthi uvale lolu hlelo lokusebenza.
content.txt3: Isizathu sokuthi sisebenzise lo msebenzi ukuthi uhlelo lwethu lokusebenza ludinga ukuba nekhono lokuvula ezinye izinhlelo futhi lizilawule, livumele ukuthi umkhiqizo uthengiwe, futhi uthumela imiyalezo kubangani abaku-inthanethi njalo, njll.
content.title: Ukusebenza okuyingozi
